name: Amogus UI
description:
you like among us?

you are bored of windows?

Then you can download for free Amogus UI, this is brand new Interface for windows, it is created for whom who dont want to use amog os

amog pc requiremnts: .net framework support

windows 7 and newer (i dont know if it will work on win7,  i tested on win10, but scientifically speaking, it should work, by einshten theory, E=Mc2, that mean that this application theoretecally, by Water Formula can work on windows xp, but by teorema of strings, it cant work on win2000, that mean that by speed formula it cant work on win 98, 95, 3.1, 3.0, and MS-DOS)

additionaly: you can run among us from Amogus UI, only if you have Among Us from Steam

Important note: Some bullshit is tryng to delete this app, because they see a virus, this is false positive, it is absolute safe, tested by amogantivirus
